ygData.subject: Re: Binding or not...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It appears the maximum damage in the game is 32,000. Mobs that get stuck in weird terrain features die with a message Blah slashes itself for 32000 or
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 04/99, Mike Roach <mroach@...> wrote:
> From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
> I'm confused about what people mean when they say "32K'd" can someone
> clarify please?

It appears the maximum damage in the game is 32,000. Mobs that get stuck
in weird terrain features die with a message "Blah slashes itself for
32000" or something like that. Lady Vox was buggy for quite some time
and did this every time a group got close to being able to kill her.

You can also take 32000 damage from running off the cliff at the top of
HighPass on the E Karana side, or so a bard friend of mine tells me.
Never tried it myself. Autorun, Selo's and typing to friends is a
dangerous combo up there.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
